author: Suraj Sunil
comment: I had recently moved on from Apple music because it's android version is just trash. Anghami seemed really nice to me at first but now the app downloads songs on its own and annoys me. I had to sit down and personally delete the songs I don't want . This is really annoying and disastrous. I want to move on but this app is the only decent one I can find in this country. Please improve!!

author: Youssef Abi Raad
comment: It's a great app. Even the FREE experience for the user without subscription is great. You can't find this free service anywhere with Class A labels and a huge library. I can't believe some people are nagging about this. And Soundcloud is nothing like this app, it's mostly indie free music.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content:
Thank you so much for the 5-star review! ❤
Our goal is to make this Unlimited Music experience as enjoyable as possible to you!
do not hesitate to provide us with any comments or feedback anytime on Support@Anghami.com

author: Big BLOCK life
comment: I previously wrote an angry review on no scrubbing anymore. And all of a sudden I got 2 months of plus features... This happiness is temporary knowing it would end. Anghami you were a great app but now you have lost the way. I did my best to give feedback and suggestions in the previous ver but now i am Dissappointed.

author: Takla Younes
comment: Im in love with anghami But i have few suggestions i'd like to see: first i'd like you to add a timer and then the misic stops alone. Second i'd like you to add an optional lock screen anghami so we can skip songs and like the one playing without unlocking the phone. Keep up the good work 👌

author: Solaire Mbs
comment: Anghami is simply the best music app in our region, it includes both arabic and international songs, most of the international releases come out almost instantly on the app too, its phenomenal!  Only issue is just that I wish we had more general podcasts on here instead of it beeing music exclusive.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Please contact us from the help center inside the app to investigate and fix the issues you're facing.

author: Yehia Shehata
comment: Good music app. Pretty decent music library that has greatly improved, and the subscription is much cheaper than Spotify. However, the free user experience is held back by many issues, most annoying of which is the inability to play the previous track.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Those functionalities are now available for Anghami Plus users. Anghami pays royalties to Music labels for every song you play, each and every time. Those restrictions allow us to maintain those costs while offering you a lot of great music for free. You can get Anghami Plus for free, please contact us on support@anghami.com for more details.

author: Menna Elmallah
comment: It's totally trying to drive us to get anghami plus by extremely annoying features. Actually playing anghami as a free app is now totally an annoying thing. Why the repeat button and the replay button ( the button that makes the track to start from the beginning ) are not working? And why it's no longer applicable to get the song to play from any point on it's length? I can repeat the song by choosing it again from the list that includes it as soon as the next song starts, so does this way reduces the costs that you pay for each and every time i play or repeat a song?   Edit: the new version is now nice Edit: why is the "music automatic switching off timer" in a specified time frame (for example 30 minutes and 1 hour, 2 hours) no longer available now? It was a really lovely option

author: Haitham Malkawi
comment: It's a great music app always updated and a perfect place if you're feeling nostalgic for some music for a low subscription, but it'd be great if you guys add Google Assistant compatibility to set this as a default music player... Please consider this.   Many thanks

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello, please write to us on support@anghami.com in order to better assist you. We are waiting for your message!

author: elias bitar
comment: Ads are really annoying, at least make it more quite. No one will subscribe if you make it louder. Most of the rest are fine

author: Khalil Melkane
comment: There is glitch in the app. I had almost 720 songs downloaded suddenly I find that all of my songs disappeared. Please check it because it happened to some of my freinds, then it happened to me .

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello, please write to us on support@anghami.com in order to better assist you. We are waiting for your message!

author: rolanda HS
comment: Anghami was working on my phone and i love the way it works but suddenly it started pausing while playing the songs and now every time i open it a message pops out telling me that it stopped working 😕 and I'm using anghami plus. Kindly fix it.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello, please write to us on support@anghami.com in order to check this issue and solve it. We are waiting for your message!

author: Hossam dawoud
comment: This update  I was listening  to song called wait  after I listen to it for a quiet a time it stop working  and to start working again he told me I have to be pay ...

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello, please write to us on support@anghami.com in order to check this issue and solve it. We are waiting for your message!

author: Ramy Medhat
comment: Fantastic app! Really good for listening to music, the only problem is that the music library is so small compared to Spotify and apple music. Although the offers that they give you for anghami plus are way better, like for example they give you the lyrics for some songs and they also support paying using any fawry machine. A truly great music assistant! 👍

author: Emad Abbas
comment: The best music app ever!! I lovvvvvve it. It's the only app that I can give up❤️😍😍.

author: Hadya Elserafy
comment: Its very good app i love it but i really wish that the songs play offline without all the ads that always pop up thats very bad thing to hear ur favourite songs and suddenly ads pop up

author: Roy Hajj
comment: Stop with the money hungry ads cash grab! And don't tell me you need the revenue from ads to survive, SoundCloud doesn't have ads and anghami is as big as SoundCloud in the MENA area right now. REMOVE ADS.

author: anas ben brahim
comment: The best thing on this app is that identify exactly your taste of music i can't believe that this app is better than Dezzer

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content:
Thank you so much for the 5 star review! ❤
Our goal is to make this Unlimited Music experience as enjoyable as possible to you! 
do not hesitate to provide us with any comments or feedback anytime on Support@Anghami.com

author: Rawad Azar
comment: I'm a big fan of anghami you guys are a Lebanese app and want to have some gain for me i dont mind paying to listen to the song but i think 4$/month is too much specialy wen you can access to all the music for free on youtube. I'm subscribed to the monthly format and i recommend to lower the fees to 1- 1.5$ so we end up paying 12-18$ per year. In addition i recommend you to make aghani to compete with shazam. If your app can find the songs then it will definitely get a 5 star

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello Rawad, We appreciate the time you had taken to drop us your comments. Make sure that your comments and suggestion will be shared with our team to take note of them.

author: Dalia Hisham
comment: How long do you think people will tolerate this new "update" before switching to another app?  I can't go backwards in a playlist, i can't play a song on repeat or move through it. Tell me again why i should keep using this app?

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content:
Thank you so much for the 5 star review! ❤
Our goal is to make this Unlimited Music experience as enjoyable as possible to you! 
do not hesitate to provide us with any comments or feedback anytime on Support@Anghami.com

author: Elie Jamous
comment: Its a bit expensive and u hv to buy the thing to listen to music other then in your house or finish ure 3G

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: To enjoy downloading music and listening offline and without ads, you have to subscribe your account to Anghami Plus so you can download millions of song from our International and Arabic catalog.

author: Omar Ali
comment: Great music app, worth every penny. Plus the developers are very nice and listen to the users. The best music app imo. Thanks for listening to users and integrating the app with Google Assistant. But is it possible to integrate it with Google Home and be able to set the app as a default music provider?

author: Zahid mustafa
comment: cool... but sometimes downloaded songs gets downloaded again... complain ed but still no response

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello Zahid, sometimes the songs files get replaced by new ones this is why they get downloaded again.

author: Tania Hajj
comment: Anghami is bad unless we are subscribed to anghami plus. Too much annoying ads..can't play previous song etc..
Please add more filipino songs, and oh, can u give me a one month free trial of the plus features? Hehe anw. Its a great app for me. Keep it up!

author: wissam moussa
comment: This is one of the fiew apps that doesn't has screen rotation but ias great overall.

author: Hamza Al-hayes
comment: Well, I would give it 5 stars or even more if possible; only if you can do better with Metal bands, i hope you'll do this thing

author: Cero cyka
comment: Casting in this app does not work, I tried casting with google chromecast audio and it doesn't work, unlike SoundCloud which does.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello charbel. Please write us immediately to Feedback@Anghami.com to investigate your case and to provide solutions. awaiting your email.

author: Lion Roby
comment: Utter useless just (play/pause) now I Can't repeat, can't skip nor seek through it is just pointless and annoying because if the song is long and I wanted to listen to the last 5 minutes of it I can't and HAVE TO listen to the whole thing. This is just an awful strategy to force people to subscribe to the paid version and I don't like being forced into buying something, I'd rather not use it at all, besides you have ad's for the free version isn't this enough?. Therfore 1 star is more than enough... For now EDIT: THANKS ANGHAMI TEAM FOR LISTENING TO OUR REVIEWS AND BRINGING BACK THE SEEK  THROUGH THE LONG SONGS AND THE SKIP FUNCTION ALSO, NOW I CAN LISTEN TO MY FAVOURITE PART OF (TARAB) SONGS WITHOUT HAVING TO LISTEN TO THE WHOLE SONG.  BEST REGARDS 😊 RATING IS 5 STARS NOW 👍

author: Abdalla Hany
comment: Being unable to rewind songs and switch to a song that passed unless you subscribe to Plus is so bad.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Those functionalities are now available for Anghami Plus users. Anghami pays royalties to Music labels for every song you play, each and every time. Those restrictions allow us to maintain those costs while offering you a lot of great music for free. You can get Anghami Plus for free, please contact us on support@anghami.com for more details.

author: Moustapha Algohary
comment: There are minor conflicts with some tracks true titles and looking forward to expanding the data base. And this is the best application in our market.

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Hello, please write to us on support@anghami.com in order to better assist you. We are waiting for your message!

author: Oussama Belhcen - أسامة بالحسن
comment: I'm a verified artist on Anghami and I really like all the services they're giving me, also I love the application here on my phone. This is not fake 😍

author: Awad Ayah
comment: I was in love with anghami untill the new update happened!

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content:
We’re very sorry to hear that you had a bad experience while using our app ☹
It’s our goal to deliver the highest quality of service to all of our users so we’d love to learn a little bit more about what prompted your feedback. Please don't hesitate to let us know on Support@Anghami.com as we can fix the problem for you right away!

author: Bassem Magdi
comment: Loved bringing back the scrubbing and rewinding for non anghami plus users, keep it up

author: wiam barto
comment: The waiting for 59.00 minutes to flip a song really!! Plus the boring adds!!

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Those restrictions are applied by our labels and content providers and we need to respect them based on our contractual agreements. To do skips with no limits, you need to subscribe to Anghami Plus or through any bundle with your operator. For further assistance or details, please do not hesitate to contact us anytime on support@anghami.com

comment: Add a shazam setting to get songs we don't know its name

author: Moustafa elbakry
comment: Iam not able to click backwards to get the song from the begining or to get the previous song...very bad

author: Amro TDS
comment: This app is great but it scammed me they offered me a 1 week plus free to test it and i didn't like it so i cancelled the test plus and i realise they toom 17.99 AED and didn't refund me!

author: Shehab Sayed
comment: It was very good at the beginning then every time i want to listen music it sent me a message saying anghami is unfortunately not working

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Please contact us immediately from the app from My Music> Help> Contact us to help you immediately fix this issue for you. We eagerly await your message!

author: Mohammad Hosban
comment: The app is amazing, the only thing that the free version lacks is the ability to school shuffle when choosing most popular songs or the singles by an artist

reply.author: Anghami
reply.content: Thank you for your amazing feedback Mohammad, make sure that your comment will be shared with our team in order to take note of it.
